Label.en: In 2004, police found an illegal cinema in one of the tunnels!
Label.fr: In 2004, police found an illegal cinema in one of the tunnels!
Label.es: In 2004, police found an illegal cinema in one of the tunnels!
Label.zh: In 2004, police found an illegal cinema in one of the tunnels!

Label.en: A fully equipped, professional cinema, complete with seats, film reels, giant screen, and a restaurant!
Label.fr: A fully equipped, professional cinema, complete with seats, film reels, giant screen, and a restaurant!
Label.es: A fully equipped, professional cinema, complete with seats, film reels, giant screen, and a restaurant!

Label.en: This cinema was totally off record!
Label.fr: This cinema was totally off record!
Label.es: This cinema was totally off record!
Label.zh: This cinema was totally off record!

Label.en: What’s more, we still have no idea who created it, who attended it, or where they drew their electricity from!
Label.fr: What’s more, we still have no idea who created it, who attended it, or where they drew their electricity from!
Label.es: What’s more, we still have no idea who created it, who attended it, or where they drew their electricity from!
Label.zh: What’s more, we still have no idea who created it, who attended it, or where they drew their electricity from!

Label.en: And it’s not the only thing of that kind! The remains of illegal parties and events are regularly found… and people often go missing down there...
Label.fr: And it’s not the only thing of that kind! The remains of illegal parties and events are regularly found… and people often go missing down there...

Label.zh: And it’s not the only thing of that kind! The remains of illegal parties and events are regularly found… and people often go missing down there...

Label.en: In fact, there’s a whole secret community of cave explorers in the catacombs! They’re called the “cataphiles”
